info.title: SMI - Netflix Communication Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Communication Management specification

get.description: This operation list a CommunicationMessage entity.

parameters.name: correlatorId
parameters.description: NB ID used to match the request with its corresponding SB asynchronous notification. The format should be like below:  ASPID+yyyyMMddHHmmss+sequence(5 digits)  Note:+ means concat  The ASPID is the M2M indentifer, and its length is maximum 21 characters  yyyyMMddHHmmss is the UTC time format.  Sequence is an increased sequence, and its length is 5 digits.the sequence should be started with 00001 and end with 99999.  Example: TP000002322017022409365100021

parameters.name: aspCallBackUrl
parameters.description: HUB will send the notify result request to this url directly

parameters.name: requestDate
parameters.description: Time and date the request is sent

parameters.name: senderBy
parameters.description: Identifier of the application or issuer of the request message

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Indicates the country to route. ISO 1366 – 3 character Example: MEX

parameters.name: targetSystem
parameters.description: The system where targets the request.

parameters.name: originSystem
parameters.description: The system where is originated the request.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Identifies the channel that invokes the service.

parameters.name: subChannel
parameters.description: Identifies the sub-channel that invokes the service.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: Id of the device from which the invocation originated.

items.description: Communication message means a notification approach in the format of a message which can be dispatched (sent) to the certain user by the system with the content which can be felt and understood by the recipient. The user can be either a final customer or a customer service agent. The message can reach the customer in different interaction channels, including: email, short message, mobile app notification (push).

country.description: Indicates the country to route. ISO 1366 – 3 character Example: MEX

originSystem.description: The system where is originated the request.

latency.description: Duration of the execution in milliseconds

correlatorId.description: NB ID used to match the request with its corresponding SB asynchronous notification. The format should be like below:  ASPID+yyyyMMddHHmmss+sequence(5 digits)  Note:+ means concat  The ASPID is the M2M indentifer, and its length is maximum 21 characters  yyyyMMddHHmmss is the UTC time format.  Sequence is an increased sequence, and its length is 5 digits.the sequence should be started with 00001 and end with 99999.  Example: TP000002322017022409365100021
